com.spectralogic.ds3client.utils

Class SafeStringManipulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spectralogic.ds3client.utils.SafeStringManipulation

  • public final class SafeStringManipulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Safely converts a type to a string. This is used when adding objects to query params.
